articles.description: Follow live commentary & text updates from the Rugby World Cup as Scotland play Romania at the Stade Pierre-Mauroy, Lille.
articles.title: Rugby World Cup: Scotland v Romania - radio & text

articles.description: Follow live commentary & text updates from fixtures across the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Build up to Aston Villa v Brighton followed by seven more matches

articles.description: Europe need four points from Sunday's 12 singles matches against the United States to regain the Ryder Cup after a scintillating Saturday in Rome.
articles.title: Europe edge closer to Ryder Cup win over US in Rome

articles.description: Referees' body PGMOL said there was "a significant human error" in Tottenham's Premier League win over Liverpool.
articles.title: PGMOL admit 'significant human error' in Spurs win over Liverpool

articles.description: Watch as Rory McIlroy has a heated exchange with Patrick Cantlay's caddie Joe LaCava in the car park at the Ryder Cup in Marco Simone Golf and Country Club, Rome.
articles.title: McIlroy has heated car-park exchange with US caddie

articles.description: Follow live coverage of Saturday's Premier League game between Wolverhampton Wanderers and Manchester City.
articles.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers v Manchester City team news

articles.description: England complete their preparations for the inaugural WXV tournament with a hard-earned 29-12 victory over a Canada side reduced to 14 in the first half.
articles.title: England battle to win over Canada to seal series

articles.description: Joel Matip's own goal deep into stoppage time gives Tottenham a last-gasp victory over nine-man Liverpool.
articles.title: Spurs beat nine-man Liverpool with late own goal

articles.description: Matt O'Riley scores a 97th-minute winner in the most dramatic of Scottish Premiership finales to give Celtic victory over Motherwell.
articles.title: Injury-time chaos ends with Celtic beating Motherwell

articles.description: Wales warm up for the inaugural WXV1 tournament with a dominant six-tries-to-three victory against USA in Colwyn Bay.
articles.title: Six-try Wales ease to win over United States
